titles.title: Lamprey Wild and Scenic River Extension Act
Lamprey Wild and Scenic River Extension Act
To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to extend the designation of a portion of the Lamprey River in New Hampshire as a recreational river to include an additional river segment.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee by Voice Vote.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 106-368.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 209.

action.text: Mr. Sherwood moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 1615.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Subcommittee on National Parks, Historic Preservation, and Recreation. Hearings held.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 106-269.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 499.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Historic Preservation and Recreation
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 4/28/1999--Introduced. Lamprey Wild and Scenic River Extension Act - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to extend the designation of a portion of the Lamprey River in New Hampshire as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System to include an additional river segment.
